content.detailedDescription: Was out back talking on the phone when i saw a row of 3 orange lights come on in a slanted angle. they came back on again about 5 minutes later as a single light, then came on a 3rd time time in a different part of the sky but same general area but this time it was very bright. was south/se of abilene texas. same orange lights that have been coming on around here for 2 years now, i last saw these lights on october 8th 2010. keep your eyes out people, they don't stay on very long. they come on and fade right back out within' 1-2 seconds.
content.summary: Orangle/amber lights over the skies again

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my truck south on west avon rd in farmington.  i noticed what i thought was an aircraft pretty low in the sky coming straight at me.  i noticed that it appeared to be low in the sky - lower than other aircraft that i see in this area as they approach bradley airport 16 miles, or so to the north.  because of this it caught my attention, and it looked a little different than other plane i have seen from the distance i was viewing it, perhaps 3/4 of a mile away at first.  i continued to drive south with anticipation that i would get a better look at it as it passed over near me.  i got to the light at rt 4.  the object was now hidden behind trees.  i turned left on to rt 4 and looked out my right side window.  i picked up the object again.  it was about to pass over my truck.  i pulled off the road and stuck my head out the left window.  i saw a rather faint outline of a triangle shape. at first i thought it was triangular.  i sort of cleared my eyes and stared again - it was straight over the top me.  i confirmed that it, indeed, was a triangle shape. the rear two angles were a rounded radius shape. now i switched my concentration to the pattern of lights on the bottom.  this is when i realized i was looking at something very different.  there were 3 rectangular, rather large, lights spaced apart going along the bottom center of the object.  they did not broadcast light, they just seemed to be illuminated.  if the object was 25 feet wide at the rear (widest part) these lights were like 5 or 6 feet wide and 4 feet the other direction.  there were 2 small strobe-like white lights on each side of the craft (perhaps half-way along the edge of the triangular side).  and there was one red light located somewhere along the center.  towards the front, i think.

the object was moving a constant rather slow speed.  it kept moving north in a straight line until it was out of my sight.  when it was straight over me it was the size of a half dollar held out at arms length.  my guess is that the object was about 800 feet above me, but i'm not sure. no sound.  i feel this may have been a secret government aircraft.  can't rule out it may have been something else.
content.summary: Saw trangle shaped object with rounded (radiused) rear corners fly straight over the top of me.  three rectanglar white lights down the middle.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room at 9:28pm i was having some trouble going to sleep, and i saw an odd shape in the sky so i get up looked out my window, it had two lights on both sides that where on the whole time, and one time all of the lights came on, all the lights were on the bottom,there was just enough light i could see the out line of the ship,it was disk shape with a dome top.I was pretty calm just frozen. i would have pictures but my sister wouldn't let me use her camera, the funny thing is she told me in the morning i should of came and got her camera. if you held a quarter up with one eye closed it would just barley cover it.
content.summary: Disc shaded, with dome top, lights coming on and off, one red light always on.

content.detailedDescription:
My youngest son asked for my cell phone to take a picture while i was driving.
i didn't notice the picture until today so here you go.
content.summary: My son asked for my cell phone to take a picture

content.detailedDescription: We were attending a halloween event at the zoo. we had stopped because the crowd had bottle-necked. i looked up into the sky at a distance and i see something flying towards us on the horizon. it wasn't quite dark yet but this thing blended into the night sky so at first i wasn't sure what it was. was it a plane, hang glider? there were no "normal" lights. i quickly realized i wasn't seeing something "normal." i told my husband to look up and at first he thought it was a flock of geese because of the formation. then he realized he was wrong too. as it came closer it appeared to have stripes of alternating glowing "lights". black, white, black, white all along the front facing portion. it made no sound. it flew overhead and then as it passed over us to the left it just disappeared into thin air!!! i remember thinking with all these people around us how come no one else is freaking out. i was shaking and had this feeling like i had just seen something i wasn't supposed to have seen. i posted immediately to my facebook account that i had just seen a ufo. i wanted there to be proof and a timestamp. i called a tv station on the way home to see if anyone else had reported anything, but got no where (not suprisingly). i haven't stopped wondering about that night since. i am so grateful my husband saw it too. i can't imagine what it would feel like to be all alone with this knowledge! i read an article in the online paper today about another sighting in ok and that's what lead me here. glad to know we aren't alone, but would love to know for sure what it was we saw! as you can tell, it was weeks ago and i can't stop thinking about it. i will never stop wishing we had the camcorder with us that night.
content.summary: Craft flew over our heads at the zoo

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside this morning at around 4:30am, i was looking up at orion when i noticed a bright satellite moving from the northwest to the southeast at a rather fast pace.  i had a small pentax monocular and used it to view the object.  when i found it in the eyepiece it was moving past orions left shoulder.  as i watched another satellite came in from the west at a high rate of speed and joined the first.  it came in and stopped directly behind the first then began following as if linked with a computer.  as i watched another satellite came in from the northeast and joined the other two, this time on the left hand side and in between, creating a triangle formation.  they then began making maneuvers, i thought of high school boys with their cars on a friday night.  one would lag behind then speed up almost rear ending the first, then leap frog in front of the other.  they made several "loops" around each other as well as other odd maneuvers.  the second two then departed the first, again in different directions at very high rates of speed.  the first continued across the sky until it disappeared down the horizon.  the "satellites" did not change color or shape, they remained a bright white in color regardless of distance or angle of view.  i say satellite because they were so far up they were just pinpoints of light, like an orb.
content.summary: Multiple satellites moving in formation with manuevers

content.detailedDescription: On 11/16/2010 at about 6:00 pm i was driving through the stephenville texas city park when i saw what appeared to be a bright star towards the south west.  the star like object was in the direction of dublin texas, and slightly above the tree line.  while i was looking towards the object, it blinked out.  i then realized it was not a star. i brought my car to a stop and the object then reappeared, but in a slightly different location to the left.  the object continued to turn off and on in a linear pattern moving from my right to my left.  the object reappeared again in a few minutes but was lower and closer to the top of the tree line.  i got my iphone 4 out and attempted to take video but the object stopped illuminating before i could activate the camera.  i stepped out of my car and got my iphone ready to take video when the object reappeared for a third time.  the first video attached below is what i caught on camera.  the second video is of what appeared to be a military aircraft flying over about 15 minutes later.  the military aircraft was coming from the ft. worth area (north) and was flying towards the dublin area at a high rate of speed.  the first 3 sightings happened from about 6:00 pm to about 6:05 pm.  the military craft flew over at about 6:15 pm.  i started to leave the park at about 6:30 at which time i got a  glimpse of the object again, but only for a brief moment.  i stayed for a few more minutes and did not see it again.   the object did not appear to be a conventional type aircraft.  i did not hear any sound and could not make out a shape.
content.summary: Star like object that blinked out then reappeared several times in a line pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
The night of this occurrence i was on my way back from houma, louisiana. i was working as a courier and i was transporting film from a theatre in houma back to the new orleans airport close to where i live in kenner, louisiana.

attached is a digital photo of a red mustang that i saw and took a picture of by the accident scene i witnessed on 3-2-2007 around 2:15 a.M. near boutte and paradis, louisiana. i passed this accident scene and i was so amazed by it i turned around and made a u turn so i could take some pictures of it. i then noticed that other cars passing this accident scene were going very fast as if they did not see anything occurring. for some reason all of the passing cars were traveling in the left lane. this prevented them from hitting the police car and going over the animal but they were not slowing down. 

when i pulled up to the accident scene for the second time i saw two police cars on the scene. one police car was in front of the animal that was laying across the right lane of the road. i noticed the windows of this police car were black and i could not see anything inside of the car. the other police car was behind the red car that was just a few feet down the road but they were in the emergency lane. i could see the back of a policeman and the front of a man standing next to the red car. the man that apparently was the driver of the car was moving his hands in the air as if to be in a deep conversation with the police officer. this man was about 6 feet tall with dark hair and he was dressed nicely. i noticed he did not have a scratch on his face yet his vehicle was badly damaged.

i came very close to getting out of my car and speaking with these two people but i did not. i have pictures but police have no record of this accident taking place! i spoke with a very nice police officer in the early morning hours of 3-5-2007 about this occurrence and his name is "clint." clint works for the st. charles parish police department. he informed me that on the night of 3-2-2007 he patroled highway 90 not far from the 310 entrance and this is exactly where the occurrence happened. he was also on duty at the exact time of the occurrence. clint stated that he did not see anything like this occur and there is no report of it. in fact no police departments have any reports of a huge animal being hit on the road in this area but i have the picture of this strange looking large animal below! i believe the police officer was being honest but this adds even more mystery to this event. it appears to be a mixture of many different animals. it has a long tail and it's head appeared to me as a beautiful golden head of a camel on the night of the occurrence. a few months ago a friend of mine went with me to the audubon zoo here in new orleans and we showed the image of this animal to a zoologist. he said he would be the one to speak with about this strange animal that we wanted to show him the digital image of. he looked it over carefully and was amazed at what he saw. he said he had never seen an animal like this and could not figure out what type it could be. crytozoologists cannot make out what type it is either. it appears to be made up of many different animals. the average person might call it a cow, horse, etc but close observation shows it is not any one animal type. i have the original sd card saved of the pictures i captured that night. i did this to prove that my images have not been edited or manipulated. the only thing done to any image below is the car was lightened because the image was to dark to see prior to lightening it. 

if you look close at the road that the animal is lying on you can see a circular pattern on it as if something landed there. one of the zoomed in images of the 3 ufo's in they sky above the occurrence shows intense colors and energy about it. notice the mustang car has an alien figure that appears on the side of it with what looks like a hand holding some type of phone. the back part of the car appears ghostly was if it vanishes. oddly the men on the scene of this accident do not appear in any of the pictures. the strange animal was huge and covered the whole right side of the lane. after i arrived back home i called all of the police departments in the area of occurrence including the state police and no one had any record of this incident occurring. i spoke with the st. charles police department where the incident occurred and they stated that any time an animal is hit in there area everyone knows about it. they had not record of it and the cars passed the accident scene very fast as if they did not see anything. 

approximately 8 hours later i drove back to the area of this occurrence with my dad and nothing was there! there was no blood on the pavement, no animal, no car, nothing! i know exactly where this occurred because this is the only route i take coming back from houma to kenner. it is right by where i get on 310 that takes me back to the kenner area. highway 90 is the only way to and from where i live to houma, la. highway 90 near boutte, la is where this incident occurred. 

during this event i noticed a stillness like no other and it was as if the universe was standing still for a few moments. a very enlightening and moving experience! i have my own beliefs in regards to what i witnessed since i have always had a very strong faith in god. after this incident i have been able to share a lot of information to many people in regards to aliens and there purpose for visiting us here on earth. (1.7 million on myspace) the book of ezekiel has many passages that express words that would make us think of modern day ufo's. i do know that i did my research and what i witnessed that night was not from earth. the image of this strange animal is unlike anything here on earth. in fact when i arrived back home i zoomed in on the image of this animal and at the head appears a very evil looking image of something. i have this image below also. i do have the original images saved on the original sd card from the digital camera i used that night to take the pictures. of course now i wish i would have tried to make contact with the men on the scene but at the time i did not know how signifacant this event would turn out to be. 

i have had some other incidents where i witnessed ufo's etc, but not quite like the night of 3-2-2007. there was an incident this same year (2007) near kentwood, la that i witnessed. it involved 2 18 wheeler trucks and one was on fire. after i passed the 18 wheeler that was in flames a triangular shaped ufo hovered over the woods very close to my car. i did not have time to take a picture but viewing it gave me a wonderful feeling. i felt as if the aliens in the craft had great knowledge and held the answers to many unexplained questions we seek. the ufo took off in the direction of the 18 wheeler on fire. i made the next exit (about 3 miles or so) to head back in the direction of the ufo. when traveling back i heard fire trucks but then nothing was found in the area of occurrence. i do have a picture of one of the trucks laying across the interstate. i plan to go back the the area of boutte, paradis, la more often and i hope i can capture something significant to share with many people. i have looked over these images many times and there are even some words that appear at the bottom of the image of the car but i cannot make them out. i shared these images with numerous priests and pastor's and they believe i was blessed with the gift of visions. (joel 2:28) i have a a very strong faith in god over many years! i will keep my faith! charles
content.summary: I witnessed an animal that appears to not be from earth and a strange car where 3 ufo's were in the sky above me!

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my house around 1:45am, letting my dog out before i went to bed.  i was having a smoke and wasnt paying much attention to my surroundings, when a blue flash came out of the corner of my eye.  i looked up, as it got my attention, about 5 seconds passed, and a very bright blue light/orb type event took place outside of a fast moving cloud.  it seemed very odd and surprising to me, it was unlike anything ive ever seen, i thought it may have been lightning at first, but when i saw the second and brighter flash occur between clouds in mid air, i knew this was something out of the ordinary.  the weather conditions at the time were partially cloudy skies, with wind gusts up to 35mph.  could this have been some type of rare weather phenomena, or was it something unexplainable?
content.summary: Bright blue flash

content.detailedDescription:
It was between 4 pm and 5 pm on november 15, 2010 at south bascom avenue in san jose, california.

i had just bummed a cigarette from my co-worker and made my way to the parking lot. once there i sat in my favorite spot with my back to the bushes and my butt on the curb to smoke. i sit there often and stare at sunsets and clouds or the appearance of the first stars in the sky.
this monday evening was warm and the sky was clear. there was a beautiful sunset and the seagulls were returning from their feeding day at the dump. the seagulls fly in a southeast to northwest direction when returning from the dump. in the morning they always fly the opposite direction on their way to feed at the dump.

while watching the seagulls i noticed a reddish/yellow cigar shaped figure moving in a southwest to northeast direction across the sky. my first thoughts were, wow, that plane is reflecting the sunlight in such a beautiful way. then i realized the sun was behind the object, from where i was sitting, and the sun had already set behind the mountains.

i continued to stare at the object to see if i could tell if the object was producing the light itself or if it might be a reflecting the sun in some other way. i then realized the object was quite large and was completely lit up by whatever the light source was. it was the only light and it did not blink or change colors. there was no halo to the light. just a solid light, almost not appearing to be a light, but none the less a very bright light. well, maybe the whole object. i say the whole object, but it was very high in the sky so maybe only part of it was lit up. whatever it was the part that was lit up was very large.

about the same time i am realizing how large the craft was by the light i was also realizing the object was very high in the sky so high i should not have seen it. i should have only seen a contrail. growing up as an air force brat you understand from experience a plane that high in the sky cannot be seen or heard; only the contrails can be seen. this object had no contrails, and was very large. at this point i decided i was seeing something i have never seen before and at that point it stopped for a few seconds and then went straight up until it just disappeared.
the craft never sped up or moved in a zig-zag motion. it moved in straight lines at the same speed until it stopped for those few seconds before ascending vertically.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Reddish/yellow

content.detailedDescription: It was friday around 12 noon , i was on my deck throwing a tennis ball out into  my back yard,to my jack russel to get her daily work out, i do this every day, the sky was clear no clouds very blue color,  i was on  my 4 or 5 throw , i spotted a object in the sky the object was really good distance from me but it was large, very large-i worked for a major airlines for 34 yrs in atlanta ga, i have seen a ton of aircraft in the sky, in all kinds of weather conditions,from the sky and on the ground, this object was just there not moving,i set down in my chair and watch it for about 4 min's-it finally move off to the left at a high rate of speed,about 5 miles or so then stop,i thought no airplane can do that,so i step in side my house and grab my binoculars,i wanted to see some wings or something on it,,i had to lay the binoculars against the collum on my deck to be able to hold  them still enough to get a good still look at it.I sighted it in and focuses my lens,,,,this was not an airplane,balloon,or anything like that,,i have seen to many aircraft ,and balloons in the sky---it was very shiny like stainless steel,it would move to side to side then up and down,it moved toward my house then stop,,at that time i saw a government aircraft come into sight ,i looked back to see what the object was doing and it was just like someone turn a light switch off,it was there for maybe 2 min's then it was gone,,,the hold thing lasted about 8 min's,,my house is one of the approach routs into atlanta airport i see a ton of aircraft every day but nothing like this. ***also i had a ufo fly over my car comeing from a drive-in-movie back in 1967  a long dark hwy,it scared my date so bad that she never went out there again,,,and i just wrote it off as a ufo--but now iam re thinking that whole night----what did we see ???---
content.summary: Oval very large ,very shining stainless steel looking

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us were traveling north on snow road near semmes. it was dark.  from the east, perhaps around 2 o'clock position, it looked like an airplane was moving westward at a typical speed.    it had the appearance of a planet - just a bright point in the sky - bluish in color.  i suppose it was this brightness that caught my attention.  no blinking lights.  however, it quickly accelerated and appeared to take a slight altitude loss trajectory.  the point of light continued to accelerate quickly and moved from our 2 o'clock position to the 10 o'clock position in about 1 or 2 seconds... then it disappeared without any notable changes in the appearance (no flash-out, etc).

the driver of the car also witnessed the event.  we both were surprised and amazed at the speed of the object as well as the obvious acceleration.  we wondered if it was meteor, but the light intensity did not change and it did not create a tail or streak so there were no signs of typical re-entry.  

a subsequent google of meteors and the like did not match what we witnessed, which is why i'm reporting this on mufon.
content.summary: Extreme excelleration of an object across night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside my home smoking a cigarette (my typical brand) and looking up at the planes approaching through the normal approach corridor on their way to salt lake city international airport. planes typically appear in the south-by-southwest, about ten degrees from south toward the west, then proceed northerly toward the airport, passing west of my residence. noticed another object that i thought was a plane at first, though it didn't move. i re-evaluated the object as a helicopter, and stared to see what kind of helicopter it was (was considering news, police, or private helicopter).

object appeared to be the same general kind of light affixed to aircraft that the planes were using, though different in quality (i'm colorblind, and so it may actually have also been a different color). i did not feel that this craft was at first any kind of extraordinary object. something was different about the light--something i can't quite put a finger on. i did not see the object itself; i merely saw the light, and noted that the sky conditions at the time were cloudy and overcast in the area due to precipitation. clouds to the west were breaking up.

the object then moved at a high rate of speed to the west, seemingly without really accelerating to that speed--it was just moving quickly, and started very suddenly. within 1-3 seconds, the object crossed 30 degrees of sky and disappeared behind some tall mountains. seeing this, the hair on the back of my neck stood up, and i felt a little upset, though also excited. i spent the next 2 hours researching aircraft and did not find any that seemed to be capable of something like that. i then decided to file this report.

the entire experience lasted less than a minute, but it seemed a significant amount of time. i am guessing about 30 seconds, though i did not have a timepiece with me.
content.summary: Vague light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: See investigation report below...
content.summary: Triangle sighted by 2 witnesses close to ground

content.detailedDescription: I was in the yard with my children and their friends. we had a small fire in the backyard fire pit and were sitting around it.  i noticed a bright light to the north of us and watched as a plane approached.  behind the plane was an arc of 5 blue lights.  the plane passed in front of the lights moving at a considerably faster speed.  the lights flashed in a random manner than flashed in an organized strobe pattern moving from bottom to top, they then flashed in random order and flashed together, repeating the pattern.  we watched the lights for a considerable time before they finally faded from view.  there was no sound associated with the sighting.  the lights were pretty, but too small to take pictures of due to light pollution. when i told my mother, who lives an hour north of us, about the sighting, she said that she had witnessed a similar object the previous week.
content.summary: 5 blue lights moving slowly and flashing

content.detailedDescription:
Driving northbound on rochester road at hamlin (see attached map), i saw about a mile ahead of me two very bright, yellow-white lights close together. the lights were very different from the street lights, car lights, and building lights in the area. all those lights looked washed out compared to the floating lights. the floating lights were also significantly brighter and larger in diameter.

at first i thought they were landing lights from a plane flying really low. as i approached i realized the lights were stationary and then thought it must be lights on the end of a high pole - perhaps they're having a carnival in the parking lot of the mall again. as i came to a stop in the left-hand turn lane at rochester and avon, it was about 20 or 30 yards away (west and slightly north) and about 4 stories up... and still not moving. i keep thinking to myself, "i can't be the only one seeing this".

the thing that stood out most was how i had traveled a mile with this thing in full view and it never appeared to move at all. no wavering, nothing, even when i was right next to it. it was just hanging there steady in the same spot.

at this point, i could make out a third light, and the three lights formed a triangle, but i could not see anything between the lights at all. i pulled out my iphone and shot 3 pictures, but only 2 came out (not very well, either. i have an iphone 3g so it's not hd).

after about 10 seconds it started to move south. it didn't accelerate, it just started moving at a slow, constant rate. as it moved over the parking lot to my left (west), i could clearly see its shape since the ground lights were illuminating it from below. it was a triangle with equal lengths on all sides and appeared to have no markings at all; just a flat, "grayish" surface with lights on the each end. i could not tell how thick it was. as it moved, the lights faded to nothing over the span of about 6 seconds and then i couldn't see it at all even though it was fairly close.

fyi, it was raining slightly and there was a slight "haze" in the air.

this may be unrelated, but when i crossed the road two miles back i saw four police cars with lights and sirens blaring as they drove through the intersection of rochester and auburn roads. two continued west and two turned south.
content.summary: Equilateral triangle with bright yellow lights on each end

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were in my backyard admiring some construction i was having done on the house when we both noticed a white shining object at a very high altitude almost straight overhead that did not seem to move like a plane and did not seem to drift like a balloon. it was on a constant trajectory travelling very slowly from the north west to the south east.

i took several photos of it and and some video as well. in several of the photos i included my house for scale. we didn't lose sight of the object, but rather stopped looking as it was tiring to keep looking upwards.
content.summary: Object looked like the head of safety pin very high in the sky travelling n-s

content.detailedDescription:
I live 10 miles nw of san francisco international airport, near the pacific ocean. i was in my backyard looking up at the jet aircraft on approach to sfo airport and i was star gazing. i was testing my new igen night vision video camera when i saw this ufo fly overhead (without sound) about 500 feet high. it was heading south on this friday night at 6:30 pm. i was able to capture about 20 seconds on video tape. i knew it was not a normal aircraft by its shape, light configuration and absence of noise. it had no strobe lights, no red left wing nor green right wing light and was flying below the 1500 foot flooring in this controlled airspace. it was moving about 300 mph. i lost sight of at as it flew far away. yes, it was a ufo! this was not my first ufo encounter. i have seen many different types flying over san francisco the past 2 years and now they fly over head almost every night.

i have a collection of ufos from may 2010 thru oct 2010 on video tape using a .001 lux 15 fps camera. we are not alone and there are many different types of ufos up there.

hope for clear skies and more sightings.

note: to see video  better, you may have to increase your computers brightness, gamma and contrast settings, as the video is a little dark.
content.summary: Boomerang shape black with 3 bright white lights on rear of craft

content.detailedDescription:
This event was reported by local newspaper journalist to mufon state director, *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).  the journalist did not submit a report and the witnesses did not submit a report.  this report is being submitted by the sd. it is being reported only for documentation of triangles seen in e oklahoma area.

i went to stigler and met with the reporter on 10/14/10 and he introduced me to two separate witnesses.  one saw the triangle on 9/16/10 and the other triangle was seen by two people on 10/26/10. second triangle was a different shape.  very elongated triangle

the witness for first event took us to the field and we walked the field during the day.  the field had been plowed and bails of hay were there in the area.  we found a spot where it was circular with green grass on outer edge and center has a bare spot.  appearance was that nothing was growing in the bare area.  rain may have washed out any imprints.  it may be that the bare spot in the middle may have been created by the tail end of the triangular object.  geiger counter showed no readings.  see attached photo.  witness indicated the lights were white and went down the side of the triangle and it was hovering when she first got a glimpse of it from the highway 2 area.  object suddenly turned straight up with the tail down when she drove past it.  she turned around farther down highway 2 and went back to get a look, but it was gone.

using michael schratt's drawings of classified aircraft she pointed out that it looked like the tr3-b aircraft.  it was about 3 stories high based on her view from the highway.  estimate is the object was about 300 feet on each side.

10/26/10 event:  husband and wife were outside about 10:30 pm looking at the stars through their telescope.  they happened to look up and saw a huge elongated triangle right above them.  it blocked out the stars and sky and they thought it was about the size of a city block.  back end appeared to be concave.  it was black with single rotating white lights on each corner of the object.  no sound was heard.  it moved slower than an airplane, but also disappeared from their view quickly. they live in the country where neighbors are not very close to each other.  land has large trees with some open spaces.

once again using michael schratt's drawings they pointed out the east german flying triangle which shows the shape of the triangle. note attached drawing
content.summary: Triangle hovering & moved to upright position onto tail end

content.detailedDescription:
I did not see this until i got home. i  reviewed all my pictures for the last 5 years and found 15 ufos more. i'll post them soon. i suggest everyone do the same - review your pictures.
this typo of ufo pictures is not big deal to me, i saw with my own eyes much better and bigger ones, 2 times - a mass sighting in russia are among them. and a few times i saw ufos in usa, about 7 times...  (not counting pictures). it's clear the sightings are on the rise.
content.summary: Saw it on the picture after got home. clear bright craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was enroute to work for the department of homeland security customs and border patrol sept-2006 past customs id 194485 class number 626a duty station piegan, montana. 

i left nc enroute to my duty station in piegan, montana. my life was threatened on amtrak train in charlotteville, virginia. a black female wearing a pink suit said that i was going to die. i was just walking past her coming from the bathroom. i did not know this female. i moved to another area of the train. i called 911 and was told to get off at the next train station in charleston, west virginia. 

i got off the train in charleston, west virginia and called the police whom told me there was nothing that they could do. i was told to make contact with amtrak police. 

i had to find a hotel for the night. i could see hotels within sight from the amtrak station in charleston,west virginia. i was afraid to take a taxi for some reason and i begged the guy working at that station to take me to a hotel because he was getting ready to close the station. the amtrak guy would not help me. i even showed the guy my homeland security papers and he did not care. 

i left the station from the back of the building. i was carrying a pillow and blanket and a black bag. i had to cross the railroad tracks and then walk to the left. this is where my mind starts going sort of blank. i remember dropping my blanket and pillow on the tracks and then running. i was attempting to make it to a bridge within site so that i could get to a hotel. i was knocked out by something and the next thing i remember is walking from another bridge about 1 mile away. i was felt like i had been drugged or something. i felt like i was in shock. my clothes were still on and i still had my black bag. something got me that i could not see. how did i get to another bridge 1 mile away from where i was at? i was on foot walking. the last people that i saw at the amtrak station before i left was the guy that worked there closing the station and a black guy getting in a taxi with some foreign guy driving. 

as a child i saw a red light in the sky on easter. i use to turn around playing as a child like i could fly. as a child i use to love to lay outside at night and look at the stars. i have always known that a higher intelligence existed that sort of watched after all of us. most of our technology comes from these beings that we cannot see. 

my intent to go and work for customs was to track down human trafficking and look for missing persons. i have always known that aliens exist but i just dont talk about it. 

before i was accepted into the customs and border patrol program i had a bad feeling that the east coast was going to be hit by something. it was like i knew that something was coming. i could feel it! my plans in life were to get me and my two boys off the east coast. i wanted to move to montana because i thought we would be safe there. i also wanted to go to the montana area because whatever i am i knew there would be others like me. 

i can meet people and i either like them or not just by eye contact. whatever this intelligence is that has came to our earth is like an energy force that can jump into a human and leave at will. you can tell when this occurs when someones eyes may change colors. i have seen these light things and they do not bother me. there is something else here on earth that is not good. i get really cold chills and have time lapses when these things are around. what ever these things are they can take you driving down the road. an example of what i am talking about is like when you drive somewhere and get to you're destination and you dont remember the trip. this time lapse thing began with me back in 1996 and 1997. may of this year i have had something that i cannot see bothering me when i am sleeping. these things can touch you! they seem to like to poke me allot to see if it hurts. most of the time i aknowledge that whatever is there and i ask for it to go away. 

there are beings on this earth that are attempting to help us and there are also beings that would like to destroy humankind. these beings can jump in and out of the human body. 

this is my opinion about our current world-china is our biggest threat. the new world order began in 2009. the power grid and banking systems will go down. it is important to hold on and hide as much cash as you can. keep you car filled with gas and stockpile food, water and antibiotics. a sign to look for is when our military starts closing down military bases. when this occurs know that the time is near to get the heck off the east coast. i feel there is going to be nuclear war. the only safe places to go are going to be the north west. 

i have been working for 4 years as a cna. i work at a place called cleveland pines in shelby, nc. i love my job but it is not what i was sent here for. i want to be on the border working in montana. i am going to re-apply and try again. 

i found you're name on jesse ventura conspiracy theory. i think that you are doing great work! 

sincerely, *(wit's name and phone numbers deleted--cms/sg) i do not have voice mail set up but i keep my phones with me at all times.
content.summary: Attack on amtrak enroute to work for customs and border protection duty station piegan, montana

content.detailedDescription:
I was *(wit's job info deleted--cms/sg) on halloween night. this night my wife was at work with me and we were sitting listening to coast to coast on the radio. she called to my attention a dancing star like thing in the sky. the lights seemed to be very bright coming off of the thing. it appeared to be the same altitude as most airliners usually travel. the thing stayed in one spot in the sky in the direction of oak ridge. i am not sure exactly what direction that would be in. this thing appeared to bounce up and down real fast and from side to side i remember once that it was making several large figure eights. i called one of my **(info deleted--cms/sg) that was working in oak ridge and gave him a general direction to look and he seen what i was seeing as well. but he had brought to my attention that there was more than one of these there were about 5 of them spread across the sky in a direct line doing the same thing. the thing appeared to be made up of red green and amber lights, but i could not make out any details of the crafts. the other lights that he had pointed out were just white with the center being multicolored. a good way in describing the movement would be to watch the director of a symphony, the tip of his wand with a light on it and that is all you could see. would look a lot like what we saw. two weeks later, one of my other fellow employees was working just east of where i was that night, was guarding the construction of a new subdivision and called me scared to death, she had seen a light coming down the side of a mountain in the valley she was working in, all she could hear was the wind, and a perfect circle of light was coming toward her(she described to me looked like a searchlight on a helicopter) but there was nothing there to be making the light. during my incident me and my wife had this eerie feeling of being watched but no missing time, except for my wife had dozed off and had a nightmare that creatures were trying to get in the car, but i was awake the whole time watching this thing. now being three years later i still have nightmares of walking outside looking up and seeing this, and or running away from it.

could someone please get in touch with me and try to give me a good explanation of what this was or if others have witnessed the same thing.
content.summary: Dancing lights of different colors

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside the office at work to smoke. i lit a cigerette i looked up at the sky and saw a glowing wedge shape object about 500ft. above the tree line. i watched for a few minutes not sure what the object was doing. the wedge seemed to be lit from the inside, but had a metalic shimmer to it. after aprox. 6 minutes, the object made a clockwise turn, very slow, northeast and slowly vanished into the darkness.

a cold chill went through my body. i was very upset and went to seek medical attention.
content.summary: It was a glowing wedge shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
Note: when this was happening i got on twitter and had over five others confirm this ufo sighting on web cam while it was happening! on twitter i am (wit's twitter id deleted--cms/sg).

ufo sighting over lax, los angeles international airport on nov 12, 2010!

date of sighing: nov 12 2010
location of sighting: lax, la, california, usa

note: the screenshots from the live cam are similar to the famous "phoenix lights" ufo sighting in arizona in 1997. 

i was watching the live web cams again and caught sight of another unusual sight on the lax live cam. now seeing something flying above an airport is no big deal, but this has been over the airport for over three hours! it looks like a very long ufo is over la right now as i write this. if you visit the live cam below, you will see it too. these ufos hovered there not moving except a little bit, i first noticed the ufos on 11-12-2010 at 20:48:44 (as recorded in photo of cam) and it continued until about 11-13-10 at 5:17:14 am (as the cam recorded in the photo). 

the four lights in a row sometimes turn off and on, but if these lights are a single ufo, then it is over three city blocks long, in comparison to the skyscrapers below it.

these four lights move in unison slightly up or down, but usually slightly left or right. they never move from being in line with each other. that is why i assume they are a single craft.

far to their right were three other lights. these lights look like orbs, same as the four on the right, but they change position from one above and two below. these three orbs sit in a triangle position, but the triangle rotates in position every few minutes.


the live lax cam is at (link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.

i am *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) and would appreciate it if you could tell me what this is all about and why after 9-11 there are ufos over lax that hold position and do not fly away.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over lax, los angeles international airport on nov 12, 2010!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and pulling into my neighborhood around o'connor and 1604 (suburbs in north san antonio) at about 9:20pm, i saw two white bright lights flying slowly ahead, they appeared to be a a relatively low altitude, as it flew closer and over my car a third bright white light turned on in the front of the craft revealing a triangular shape, as it passed overhead i could clearly make out the shape against the sky that was lit up from san antonio city lights and i clearly saw the black triangular shape, it might had have some very dim lights in the center but not nearly as bright, it made no noise and i stared at it until it disappeared over the treeline still moving fairly slow going west/southwest. did anyone else see this!?
content.summary: Two white lights, as it flew overhead a third light lit up and revealed a triangular shape

content.detailedDescription: I have multiple pics from my iphone what do i do with them? they are extraordinarywe had finished dinner weird lights in the eastern sky army helicopters slow moving lights that changed from one shape to another this is something weired let me take a. pic when objects were near the camp hero radar tower they lost their light i'm not sure if they were there or maybe offshore
content.shape: Cigar,   Chevron,   Circle,   Disc,   Square,   Rectagular,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Moved slow at about 30 degrees from horizon of our deck looking east from block island to camp hero radar antenae then disappeared i have multiple pics of event  from my iphone what do i do with the piccs?

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside our backdoor at approximately 9 p.M. and noticed a very bright light flash in the southern sky at 30 or 40 degrees.  at first i thought it was my imagination but kept eyes focused in the general area.  then it flashed again and the light diminished in intensity until it was invisible.  it was traveling north about the speed of a plane but with the exception of the bright flash, there were no navigational lights that i could determine.  the strange part of it was the pattern of flight.  it seemed to be traveling in a straight line but would suddenly appear off to the left as if it had made a sharp turn. sighting only lasted less then 2 minutes until it finally disappeared from view. there was no sound at all.  i would estimate the height to be about 20,000 to 30,000 ft.
content.summary: Bright flashing light diminishing in intensity and traveled north erratically

content.detailedDescription:
I was facing south looking at the stars when directly overhead i spotted an orange rectangle with three orange lights inside the rectangle. this object was moving at a pretty fast pace as i only observed it for about 6 seconds before i lost it behind nearby trees. this object was moving from the west to the east. if you hold a ruler at arms length it was about 1/4inch wide and 3/4inches long. it was outlined in orange with three orange lights inside, one on each end just inside the rectangle and one in the middle. it also looked grayish in between the lights. i could not see how thick it was. the altitude was lower than passenger jet liners i see all the time that i assume are at about 40,000ft. i figured this was about 30,000ft.
i heard no sound as it moved across the sky at about 3 time the speed of a jet liner. i was the only witness to this sighting.
 _________
| *  *  * |
__________

 this is what i saw, the bottom line should be higher to form the shape correctly but you get the idea.

 i have read and have seen on tv reports of triangular and v shapes in the sky and that is why i was so surprised to see this rectangle and wanted to report it. this object had no rounded edges like a cigar shape would have.
content.summary: Orange colored rectangular ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I first noted the object approximately at 6:30pm. i was driving on 25 north, around half an hour outside of rochester, when an unusual object caught my eye. i watched it for a while and grew more and more curious - from my vantage point on the road, it seemed like two lines of light, almost a -- --, and they alternated between flashing white and red. the movement also seemed unusual, as it seemed to bob and weave around in the sky, and at one point dropped straight down what must have been a considerable distance in the sky. i've worked night shift the past few years and thus drive a lot at night - i've seen planes and even helicopters in the sky, and nothing i've seen looked like this thus far.

after about 10-15 minutes it seemed to fly off into the horizon, and out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright white flash in the sky, and the object seemed to once again be closer to 25 north. once again it seemed to move around in the sky, still not behaving like anything i've ever seen. it was at this point i began to grow excited, as i've never witnessed anything similar before.

after another couple of minutes there was another flash in the sky. sadly, once again i did not see the flash directly, but caught it from the corner of my eye. the object was still a little ways off in the distance, moving around in an odd manner. 

in total i watched the object for about half an hour before i moved into rochester and lost sight of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object with two long lights flashing between white and red behaved unconventionally in sky. flashes of white light appeared twice.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

i was traveling in brazil and i decided to take some shots from the patio with my new nikon camera during the night.

you can see from the sequence of shots that i was doing tests to get the best results for night shots.

they are all high def shots, some with some motion blur but some good ones.

when i move the files from my camera to my computer i was able to see the objects and some of the pictures.

the pictures are in sequence and always pointing for the same side of the building, but some with 300mm zoom other's with 70mm.

so, i would like to know more about it, what they are of if this is some reflex from my lens of something else.

it's not my first time facing this kind of objects, i saw another one flying over chicago during the day and i took another picture from inside of the airplane.

thanks,
content.summary: 3 saturn-like objects flying over são paulo in brazil
